summary:
This Mod can let you remember your pair-settings of weapons or spells && your suits of Armors and Ornaments.
No matter your settings is Sword-Shield|Sword-Spell|double daggers|twohanded spell
It can remember them and switch between them when you press the hotkeys.
descriptionHtml:
*****************Description******************
This Mod can let you remember your pair-settings of weapons or spells && your suits of Armors and Ornaments.
No matter your settings is Sword-Shield|Sword-Spell|double daggers|twohanded spell
It can remember them and switch between them when you press the hotkeys.
*vertion 1.6
 add unequip_all_items before put on new suit
                                                    
*Add new mass hotkey versin!
****************************************************
Mass Hotkey version
step2: press shift+(F1    F2    F3   F4) to memorize your settings of weapons
step3: press ctrl+(F1    F2    F3   F4) to switch your settings.   

step4: press shift+( F6 F7 F8) to memorize your settings of Armors and Ornaments.
step3: press ctrl+(F6 F7 F8) to switch your settings.   

Ori:
step1: equip your weapons or spells.
step2: press Num7\\Num4\\Num1\\Num0 to memorize your settings of weapons
step3: press F1    F2    F3   F4 to switch your settings.   
(↑ the former version only for weapons)

step4: press Num8\\Num5\\Num2 to memorize your settings of Armors and Ornaments.
step3: press F6 F7 F8 to switch your settings.   
(↑ the latest vertion for both weapons and armors. the weapon switch hotkeys are the same with those upper ones)


*you can change this hotkey by edit the .ini file

*your settings will be saved even after you close the game.

*this mod can work on V1.3.10 Skyrim.


******************Installation******************


1. Script Dragon files are included in my files already.

2. Or you can Install Script Dragon from the below link
  http://forums.bethsoft.com/index.php?/topic/1292671-rel-script-dragon/page__st__20

3. Place WEAP ShortCut.asi and WEAP ShortCut.ini or Suit Swich.asi and Suit Swich.ini along with the other two files into your root Skyrim folder, alongside TESV.exe. Not the Data folder.

******************Uninstalling******************
Delet WEAP ShortCut.asi and WEAP ShortCut.ini
Or Suit Swich.asi and Suit Swich.ini 
******************Credit******************
Thanks to Alexander Blade for Script Dragon.
author: Andy Stark
